original_title: Baby Rose Marie: The Child Wonder
overview: Rose Marie, aged five or six, sings three numbers, "Heigh Ho, Everybody, Heigh Ho", "Who Wouldn't Be Jealous of You", and "Don't Be Like That". She's animated throughout, acting as well as singing.
tagline: The loveliest, youngest flapper of them all - crooning favorite melodies.
title: Baby Rose Marie: The Child Wonder
